A Fell Light is in Them.effect: At end of move, choose enemy w/in 12" to take Intelligence Test; if failed, pull enemy directly to this model up to full move (unless obstructed, and not out of Combat) and no further movement for that model.

Ancient Enemies (%s).effect: reroll To Wound rolls of 1 vs %s

Bane of Kings.effect: reroll failed To Wound rolls in Shooting or Striking

Bodyguard.effect: auto-pass Courage Tests if bodyguarded Hero is alive and on board

Burly.effect: no -1 using 2h weapon; full moves when carrying Heavy Object

Cave Dweller.effect: +1 on Jump/Leap/Climb tests; no penalty fighting in the dark

Dominant %s.effect: counts as %s models near objective or escaping the board

Expert Rider.effect: reroll Jump/Swim/Thrown Rider test; pick up Light Object w/o dismount; use shield bonus while mounted

Expert Shot.effect: make 2 Shooting attacks in Shoot Phase

Fearful.effect: must take Courage Test to Charge; no move if failed

Fell Sight.effect: can Charge w/o Line of Sight and/or Stalk Unseen models

Fly.effect: ignore models/terrain/Control Zones; can't end on Woods unless lands, moving4"

Foresight of the Eldar.effect: before game, roll d6 for points Elrond can expend to increase Priority Roll

General Hunter.effect: if this model slays enemy General, regain one spent Might point

Hadhafang.effect: Elven 1.5h weapon, +1 to Wound vs Spirit

Harbinger of Evil (%s).effect: enemies w/in %s are -1 on Courage Tests (doesn't stack)

Horse Lord.effect: Wounds vs Mount are saved on d6=6; rider can use Fate points on behalf of Mount

Invisible.effect: unaffected by Magical/Special Powers & Shooting; ignore models when moving; Charging enemies take Intelligence test @ -1 per 1" distance; if alone in Combat, enemy is 1/2 Fight & no Support

Large Target.effect: when Shooting target, ingnore non-Monster/Siege Engine/War Beasts for In The Way

Lord of the West.effect: may reroll one d6 for both Duel Rolls and Strikes

Master of Battle (%s).effect: duplicate enemy Heroic Action w/in 6" on %s w/o spending Might

Monstrous Charge.effect: when Charging, +1 Attack & enemies w/<S Knocked Prone (cavary Knocked Flying) before Strikes

Morgul Blade.effect: use 1x/game before Strikes against one enemy; if any Wound unsaved, enemy is KIA

Mountain Dweller.effect: move normally through rocky terrain, reroll Jump/Leap/Climb Tests

Noldorin Daggers.effect: can be thrown; reroll Wound rolls of 1 for both Strikes and Shooting Attacks

Resistant to Magic.effect: gain extra die on all Resist Tests

Set Ablaze.effect: unless immune to fire, affected model suffers S5 hit in End Phase until Lying Down & Crawling 1", or entering water

Sharpshooter.effect: may choose rider or mount when Shooting at Cavalry

Shieldwall.effect: if non-cav, non-prone, has shield, and in base contact with two other Shieldwall models, +1 Defense before Backing Away

Spectral Walk.effect: move normally through Difficult Terrain; auto-6 for Climb/Jump/Leap/Swim Tests

Stalk Unseen.effect: partially concealed Infantry can't be seen if more than 6" away

Survival Instinct.effect: must take Courage Test for each unsaved Wound; if failed, remove as a casualty

Swift Movement.effect: never slowed by non-water Difficult Terrain, ignores obstacles w/o Climb/Jump

Sworn Protector (%s).effect: auto-pass Courage Tests if %s is alive and on board

Terror (%s).effect: %s models trying to Charge this model must pass Courage Tests; if failed, no Move

Terror.effect: models trying to Charge this model must pass Courage Tests; if failed, no Move

The Shipwright's Power.effect: gain 1 free Will Point at start of each turn; lost if unused at turn's end

Throw Stones.effect: if no move, model can throw stone in the Shooting Phase

Timid.effect: Mount must take Courage Test to Charge (w/o Special/Magic benefit); if failed, no Move; if success, no Cavalry Charge bonus

Unyielding Combat Stance.effect: negate Knocked Prone, on 4+; if mounted, or Knocked Flying, dismounted and auto 6 on Thrown Rider chart

Venom.effect: reroll failed Wound rolls; after Combat, enemy wounded by this model but not slain receives an extra Wound

Will of Evil.effect: lose 1 Will if in Combat with non-invisible enemy; KIA when 0 Will; can't spend last Will on Magic; ignores Invisible special rule

Woodland Creature.effect: move through woods/forest difficult terrain as if it were open ground
